Package brickdestroy.model

Class Level

java.lang.Object
brickdestroy.model.Level
public class Level extends Object
A level class that is responsible to make levels of games, to switch to next level and to check whether there is any more levels left.

    • Level

      public Level(Rectangle drawArea, int brickCount, int lineCount, double brickDimensionRatio, Wall wall)
      A level constructor thar initialises the level class variables.
      Parameters:
      drawArea - the area to draw the levels
      brickCount - the number of bricks
      lineCount - the number of lines of bricks
      brickDimensionRatio - the dimension ratio of brick
      wall - the wall object

  • Method Details

    • makeSingleTypeLevel

      public static Brick[] makeSingleTypeLevel(Rectangle drawArea, int brickCnt, int lineCnt, double brickSizeRatio, int type)
      Makes a level that has only one type of brick.
      Parameters:
      drawArea - the area to draw the levels
      brickCnt - the number of bricks
      brickSizeRatio - the size ratio of the brick
      type - the type of brick
      Returns:
      the brick arrangement

    • makeChessboardLevel

      public static Brick[] makeChessboardLevel(Rectangle drawArea, int brickCnt, int lineCnt, double brickSizeRatio, int typeA, int typeB)
      Makes a level that has two types of bricks.
      Parameters:
      drawArea - the area to draw the levels
      brickCnt - the number of bricks
      lineCnt - the number of lines of bricks
      brickSizeRatio - the size ratio of brick
      typeA - first type of brick
      typeB - second type of brick
      Returns:
      brick arrangement
